Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: J.J. "jack"
Reviews.Content: I was worried about the brand and lack of reviews for this TV. This Seiki set has a great picture, easy setup and great sound.Better sound than my Sony and Samsung TVs.I did buy the 3 year warranty, probably wasn't needed. I will update this if any thing changes my mind.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: J. Guardado
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV. I was worried about the brand but after setting it up, this television looks great and is functioning perfectly. The picture is great and the sound is excellent. I will post any updates if something changes but for now i recommend getting this TV.

Reviews.Title: Really good TV with Good sound
Reviews.Author: letsgocamp
Reviews.Content: I just received this TV, will update if anything changes.  Good picture and good sound.  Pleasantly surprised for the price that this TV performs that well.  I bought the 3 year warranty for $25, So I came out pretty good I think!

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Eaumond
Reviews.Content: Got this tv a few days ago and so far it's working really well, I am surprised because it is an off brand..sound : nice and loud. :)Picture : pretty good, haven't played any games on it yet though.Only thing I didn't like was that the fedex guy tried to walk away and just leave a tv all out in the open... But that's not really the products fault.

Reviews.Title: Worst Customer Support
Reviews.Author: G. Turbin
Reviews.Content: Average picture, very slow response remote control. Picture went out in 8 months (common w/ Seiki). After over 1 1/2 months, emails, and 10 hours of being on hold and conversations w/ Seiki Customer Support, I am still waiting on them to process and ship my replacement.(though I have been told many times they are waiting on UPS...not true!) A simple search on online I found that many others have an identical experience with the product and company.

Reviews.Title: Seiki is not sucky!!!
Reviews.Author: ü áíôçñïðùò êáêüò "Rob"
Reviews.Content: Super pleased with this tv! Received this tv free when purchasing another item for my house (obviously the "free" aspect makes me a bit biased) but as it so happens, I have another tv comparable to this one already. I also have a Phillips 32" LED flat panel model# PFL4505D/F7 that I purchased about 3 years ago for $300-350 (when that was about the lowest price for a 32" flat panel, especially name brand) and this one has features I've wished for on my Phillips since I bought that one!!!I've spent about an hour playing with this tv, the color saturation and picture controls are more customizable than my Phillips and the picture quality is comparable (the Phillips has "modes" more than adjustment "bars" for specific settings like the Seiki). The sound is pretty good, it's a bit better than the Phillips (Seiki's speakers are on the bottom of the panel pointing down and I believe my Phillips has them pointing backwards). I usually use the tv's speakers rather than the home theater I have since I live in an apartment and don't want to be "that neighbor;" that said, I'm sure a home theater would deliver superior sound quality but I'm not at all disappointed having spent a couple years being acclimated to "flat panel" speakers.The awesome part!!!! (for some of us) VGA/D-SUB port!!!! For the non-geeks that means if your computer has a monitor cable using the blue connector end (with the little thumb-screws connected) it will work on this tv. My wife uses a netbook to write papers for grad school and uses a monitor instead of the tiny netbook screen so she can see multiple windows (Win Starter won't let you extend your desktop, only mirror) now she could EASILY see multiple windows. . . but she'll probably laugh at me and tell me that I'm strange and that a 32" computer monitor would be overkill. . . go price a 32" computer monitor. . . they're astronomical. Planning to see if I can make my desktop pc's graphics card angry by using HDMI, D-SUB, and DVI out simultaneously to play a computer game whenever I get free time, it'll either be cool or expensive (melting computer parts). Lol. It's also got a usb port. . . maybe I'll plug in my USB pet rock. . . no, seriously, they make those, they're on Amazon, go search for them, you know you want to.While I can't speak to the product's longevity, I'm pretty satisfied with it. As of right now, assuming it doesn't break quickly, I would look as Seiki products in the future. It seems like if you can find this tv for sale it's near the bottom of the price point for comparable units. I haven't seen anything thus far that would make me shy away from this tv for the $200-300 range. That said, these are all first impressions so. . . grain of salt.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Bud
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV because of the price.  Price was a major consideration because it will only get used about 2 hours a week.  I hooked it up and programmed it which took about two minutes.  I also selected my favorite sound output and discovered the TV had a built in equalizer. Excellent sound for a small low priced TV.  I am quite impressed with the options and quality of the TV.  I also noticed it had 3 HDMI and PC connection ports.  I would surely buy it again and will look at other Seiki products in the future.

Reviews.Title: Its All Good
Reviews.Author: Nancy Hernandez
Reviews.Content: The Tv Has All Digital Not The Clearest Picture But For The Price Its Well Worth The Buy For An Hd Tv

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: T. P. "T. P."
Reviews.Content: I got my tv on time and I'm on it now typing this review. I use it as a tv/monitor for my computer. Great value!Thanks

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: melsmom
Reviews.Content: just what my husband wanted  a computer monitor and a T V all in one for is workshop perfect fit

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Melissa L.
Reviews.Content: It's been a month since I bought this for myself. Although I am not a big television watcher, it is doing what it is supposed to do for me for now. I needed to update my old tv in my bedroom as I was unable to see the alerts at the bottom of the screen on the old tv. This is working just fine for me.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: jonathan casado
Reviews.Content: very very very very good  it was fast and ease  to oder the item is very good it was a gift for my mom and she love it

Reviews.Title: Great Bargain TV for second bedroom, or spare den!
Reviews.Author: Cool Spot
Reviews.Content: I got this TV during the Black Friday 2013 "Lightning Deal". It's a great purchase for a second bedroom TV or spare guest room, or even those just wanting a quality HDTV without any of the frills of newer TV sets.It has 3 HDMI, 1 Component, 1 Composite, VGA/PC.Screen quality is great if you take the time to adjust picture settings from their preset values. I have it currently hooked up to my Wii U ( as well as PS2 ) and haven't had any issues with video game consoles. Sound is average for TV speakers, but you can add external speakers or a sound system if you wish. Does not have Optical Input, so you'd have to use RCA jacks (red/white) for sound.The inputs are lined up to the left of the TV on the back, and there are physical buttons (power, volume up/down, channel up/down, etc.) on the right edge bezel.The stand assembly was a little odd as you need a screwdriver for 4 screws. Maybe I"m just used to other HDTVs having the big metal bolt that secures it to the TV.Setup is a breeze, menus are clean and are not confusing. Power on time is pretty good, as is the switching of inputs. The remote has all the buttons and then some. It's useful just pressing the specific button than having to dig through the menus to find the desired function.Brand name "Seiki" may be a big question of unknown TV quality, but in my experience, it seems great! If you are worried about the long-term reliability of a TV, purchase a warranty service from companies such as SquareTrade.Pros:+Weight+Easy to Setup+Remote is fully featured+Picture qualityCons:-Not 1080p-Assembly of base is unusual for some-Brand name may be a turn-off

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: tern2
Reviews.Content: So far so good.  This TV is great, super picture, light weight, easy set up.  Would definitely purchase this again.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Rebbie
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV for the price, the picture is beautiful, it was more then i expected Highly Recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great Television for the price
Reviews.Author: Lena
Reviews.Content: The TV was the right size for my spare bedroom (grand children's bedroom whenever they're spending the night).  The picture is nice and clear.  I'm very satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the price on comparable models
Reviews.Author: John Parker
Reviews.Content: I've only had it a month. So far the picture is great and it has been problem free. I wasn't familiar with the brand but thought it was worth a try.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: peppino panecaldo
Reviews.Content: this TV has great picture and sound . I could not have asked for a better TV for the price

Reviews.Title: good product and price
Reviews.Author: pug
Reviews.Content: so far very good product. easy to hook up. works well with my sattelite system. price was low enough, so i bought the extended warranty. would recomm.end

Reviews.Title: This TV is fantastic!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Joel Puente
Reviews.Content: Nice and clear-a great buy for anybody!It really neat for a college student that's on a tight budget!!!It's great for playing video gamesNo complaints here!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Good TV - good price
Reviews.Author: Vincent AmazonTucei
Reviews.Content: Recently purchased this TV. It seems to be a good TV especially for the price. Glad I purchased it and would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money on this junk...
Reviews.Author: William A Julian Jr
Reviews.Content: Television broke withing eight months. Now it must be shipped back to the manufacturer at MY expense and it will be replaced by a remanufactred unit. I don't expect that to last any longer. I'm considering just throwing it in the trash. It's not worth the shipping. The sound and picture are mediocre at best.

Reviews.Title: Purchased this item with a one year warranty.
Reviews.Author: Anita Mountain
Reviews.Content: The TV has to be replaced due to two white vertical lines on the screen.  Seiki informs us that we must pay to ship the TV back.  Since this is a warranty repair, can Amazon get these charges reversed?

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the $$
Reviews.Author: Clyde
Reviews.Content: Don't know how long it will last.  But I'm not sure why someone would pay more for a second TV of this size.

Reviews.Title: A great inexpensive TV.
Reviews.Author: Marco Marzulla "Marco"
Reviews.Content: I needed a television for my xbox but didn't really feel like spending over 200 dollars for a tv. I could have stuck to my old boob tube but I needed HD man. You know how it is, especially with all these pretty games like Witcher 2 and Skyrim wishing to be appreciated in full high definition glory. Being the budget conscience (cheap/broke) guy that I am, I went on a quest to browse amazon for deals. There had to be something that was cheap and relatively large out in this day and age right? Wrong. I guess I could have sprung for that $250 32inch on sale with all the refresh rate bs but I don't really care about that and it was 50 dollars more than I had at the time. After a few hours on google and amazon looking at 23"-28" tvs I stumbled onto this one that was not only larger than the ones I had been browsing, but actually a little cheaper. Seiki? Who the hell is that? I thought it may be some knock off brand that trys to sell crap quality electronics. Don't Care. Read the reviews that said it worked, and I was sold. For a whooping $170 dollars I got a 32inch HD tv. It looks just like everyone else's, and the picture looks great. I don't know anything about TV's  other than what the pictures coming out of it should look like. I can't tell any difference playing my xbox on this cheapo (in price, not quality) tv and playing it on my friends $350/400 32inch tv. As an added bonus, I used the free super saving shipping that usually takes forever to get anywhere and i got it in 2 days. Not 2 business days, 2 days. I ordered it, waited one day, then got it the next day after work. Free. Probably cant rely on this instance for your experience, but still that was awesome. Easy to set up too. Great price, great buy.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for me
Reviews.Author: cerio
Reviews.Content: I guess every one has a different opinion.All TV's come from china and a lot of manufactures have production problems.I bought 3 of these not from amazon but from big lots for $199 each.i could not be happier.I have not used the tv, just using these as gaming computer monitors. I have a huge desk shaped like a square horse shoe.  One monitor in the middle and pone on the right and one on the left.I had to tweek the picture adjustments using the coustom settings but that gave me a great picture.The way I have them set up with my NVidia 6 gig video card in surround mode,I have the largest desktop on the planet.When I get on the internet,my google home page covers the whole room.And my video games look awsum. "yes,i am a hardcore gamer".These 3 TV's make for an awsum man-cave. Well enough said,back to crisis 2 and call of duty black ops.

Reviews.Title: Horrible...Lsated 2 weeks
Reviews.Author: Jen Mom of Twins
Reviews.Content: Horrible....Lasted 2 weeks. Do Not Waste Your Money. Never Again. I wouldn't want this peace of crap for free. Not Happy At All!!!!

Reviews.Title: Upset
Reviews.Author: Goldie
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv for my boys during Christmas and the tv lasted evey bit of a few weeks before it fell and cracked.  The stand is not sturdy and the slightest touch will cause it to tip over.
